description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Choosing option 1 leads to a guaranteed split of the round payoff, which can be beneficial if both players choose it
The outcome of the round is heavily influenced by the choices of both players, indicating a strategic element to decision-making
There is a risk-reward dynamic in choosing option 2, as it can yield a higher payoff if the other player chooses option 1, but results in zero payoff if both choose option 1
The game encourages players to consider the potential actions of their opponent when making their own choice
The memory indicates that both players chose the same option in the previous round, suggesting a tendency towards cooperation or predictability in their strategies
